INDIGOElement¶

class INDIGOElement(tag, prop)[source]¶

This is a class representation of a elements of properties in the INDIGO protocol.

Variables:
  • name – Name of the element.
  • prop – Name of the property that the element takes part in.
  • attributes – List of all attributes that the current element has.
  • value – Value tha the element has.
